articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Ui Hyon 
   Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Ri Ui Hyon, deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and chairman of the South Hamgyong Provincial Rural Economy Committee, on Thursday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from C.C., Vietnam General Confederation of Labor
articles.content:
Kim Jung Rin Meets Vietnamese Delegation 
   Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and conversed with the delegation of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor headed by its Senior Vice-President Nguyen Hoa Binh at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

FM Meets New Icelandic Ambassador to DPRK 
   Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, met and conversed with Gunnar Snorri Gunnarsson, new Icelandic ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.

DPRK Ambassador to Myanmar Appointed  
   Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Sok Chol was appointed as DPRK ambassador e.p. to Myanmar, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

Delegation of Youth League Leaves for China 
   Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Secretary of its Central Committee Kil Chol Hyok left here Thursday to visit China.

Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Myanmar
   Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ATCC) -- Segun un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Sok Chol fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario coreano a acreditarse en la Union de Myanmar.
